name: bewcloud
description: Bewcloud is a self-hosted personal cloud platform that helps users store, manage, and sync files across devices. It focuses on ease of use, privacy, and simplicity, making it a lightweight alternative to larger cloud services.
features: Personal Cloud: Store and manage files on your own server. Complete data ownership.
Cross-Device Sync: Access files from any device automatically. Seamless synchronization.
Privacy-First: Self-hosted solution ensures data never leaves your control. No third-party access.
Simple Interface: Easy-to-use web UI for file management. Intuitive navigation.
Lightweight: Minimal resource requirements for efficient operation. Runs on modest hardware.
File Sharing: Share files and folders with others securely. Controlled access.
Mobile Access: Manage files from smartphones and tablets. Access anywhere.
Easy Setup: Quick deployment with minimal configuration. Start quickly.
